mapper.select: select faq_id, faq_title, faq_content, view_count from inquiry_faq order by faq_id desc limit 0, 8;
select * from inquiry_faq order by num desc limit #{start}, #{perpage}
mapper.insert: insert into inquiry_faq (faq_id, faq_title, faq_content) value (#{faq_id}, #{faq_title}, #{faq_content})
mapper.select: select faq_id, faq_title, faq_content, view_count from inquiry_faq where faq_id=#{faq_id}
mapper.update: update inquiry_faq set faq_id = #{faq_id}, faq_title = #{faq_title}, faq_content = #{faq_content}, where faq_id = #{faq_id}
